        facilitates interaction with organizer upon login

        username - organizer username
        accountManager - manages data of all accounts in program
        friendManager - manages friendList functionality
        conversationManager - manages messaging functionality
        eventManager - manages event data
        signupManager - manages event signup functionality
        presenter - specifies the UI
